title: Frequency comb UV spectroscopy with one million resolved comb lines
authors:
Andrey Muraviev, Dmitrii Konnov, Sergey Vasilyev, Konstantin
  Vodopyanov
abstract:
We perform dual-comb spectroscopy in two UV bands: 325-342 nm and 372-410 nm,
corresponding to the 7th and 6th harmonics of a dual-comb 2.35-{\mu}m laser
source, and simultaneously resolve ~500,000 and ~1,000,000 comb lines spaced by
80 MHz respectively.
